Cyberpunk Cityscape.brief: Created a large-scale cyberpunk city environment.
Cyberpunk Cityscape.description: A large-scale cyberpunk city environment with atmospheric effects such as fog, glowing billboards, neon reflections, and Niagara-based portals connecting city zones. Cinematic cityscape renders emphasize mood, lighting, and vertical scale.

The Edge District.brief: A procedural generation (PCG) project focused on creating a large-scale abandoned town environment.
The Edge District.description: A procedural content generation tool for automatic building placement along defined road layouts. Enabled scalable abandoned town creation, improving workflow efficiency for level design.

Nexus.brief: A third-person cyberpunk stealth game prototype developed in Unreal Engine.
Nexus.description: Nexus is a third-person cyberpunk stealth game prototype developed in Unreal Engine.

Chase Animation.brief: A cinematic chase sequence set in the world of Nexus.
Chase Animation.description: A cinematic chase sequence set in the world of Nexus, depicting the moment when the protagonist Molly fails her heist and leaps out of a window as enemies pursue her.

Gibberwave.description: A text adventure game with a bit of absurd humor. Your goal is to collect and purify enough nonsense to restore the town to normal before everyone completely turns into alien creatures.
